problem1.question: What is Funding Product and how do I earn?
problem1.answer:
The financial management products are tools and solutions developed by the company to help users receive rewards quickly.
By staking digital assets on a blockchain network, users can earn rewards based on the POS (Proof of Stake) mechanism.
In this mechanism, users delegate their digital assets to a node, which then gains the right to perform actions like block creation and transaction packaging on the blockchain and receives rewards.
Users share the rewards obtained by the node in proportion to the number of staked positions.

problem2.question: How is expected yield calculated?
problem2.answer: Expected income is a projected daily estimate based on your subscription quantity and the product's annualized reference calculation, provided for informational purposes only.

problem3.question: When does interest start accruing?
problem3.answer: Interest accrual begins at 00:00 on T+1.

problem4.question: When are payouts made?
problem4.answer: Interest begins to accrue from T+1, and the earnings are distributed together with the principal after maturity.

problem5.question: What happens after the product matures?
problem5.answer: Fixed-term products are automatically redeemed upon maturity.

info.title: What is a Financial Product?
info.definition: Financial products allow users to lock in a certain amount over a set period to earn rewards. They include various packages managed by Upstart, each with its own rate and duration.
info.settlement: Settlement occurs at 00:00 UTC each day, and income from 'T‚Äëday' is available starting from T+1 day.
info.trade1: 1. **Buying**: Subscribe to a product to lock funds for the specified duration.
info.trade2: 2. **Earnings**: Earn daily rewards at the advertised rate, credited every 24 hours.
info.trade3: 3. **Redemption**: After the holding period, principal and rewards are returned to your finance wallet.
info.trade4: 4. **Early exit**: Currently not supported. Future versions may allow early redemption with a fee.

vip.vip2: VIP2: At least 300 USDT of assets + invite 2 A-level, 2 B-level, and 2 C-level active members.
vip.vip3: VIP3: At least 1000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 5 A-level, 5 B-level, and 5 C-level members.
vip.vip4: VIP4: At least 5000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 15 A-level, 15 B-level, and 15 C-level members.
vip.vip5: VIP5: At least 20000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 30 A-level, 30 B-level, and 30 C-level members.
vip.vip6: VIP6: At least 50000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 60 A-level, 60 B-level, and 60 C-level members.

overview.description: Upstart quantitative trading collects and analyzes major data from crypto exchanges, executing high-probability trades via algorithms.
overview.advantages: Provides more precise and efficient profitability compared to manual trading.
overview.assets: Targets various cryptocurrencies such as BTC, ETH, and USDT.
overview.automation: Supports automatic entry, exit, profit-taking, and loss reduction.
overview.no_manual: No need for manual trading decisions. Earn efficiently and stably.

method.title: Quantitative Method
method.step: Click the button to start and complete an automated trade within 1-3 minutes.
method.profit_share: 50% of the profit goes to the platform, 50% returns to the user.
method.example: Example: Buy BTC worth 1000 USDT on CoinEase, sell for 1050 USDT on OKX. 25 USDT goes to the platform, 25 USDT returns to the user.

vip_daily.vip1: VIP1: Up to 5 trades per day, daily profit rate between 1.8%-2.1%.
vip_daily.vip2: VIP2: Up to 6 trades per day, daily profit rate between 2.3%-2.6%.
vip_daily.vip3: VIP3: Up to 7 trades per day, daily profit rate between 3.9%-4.3%.
vip_daily.vip4: VIP4: Up to 8 trades per day, daily profit rate between 5.9%-6.4%.
vip_daily.vip5: VIP5: Up to 9 trades per day, daily profit rate between 8.6%-9.4%.
vip_daily.vip6: VIP6: Up to 10 trades per day, daily profit rate between 9.5%-10.5%.

agencyCooperation.title: Agency Cooperation
agencyCooperation.subTitle: Counselor Partnership
lines: Join the Upstart team program and earn commissions by promoting Upstart. Enjoy Upstart‚Äôs convenience and sustained growth like no one else.
Upstart offers every user a generous team-commission reward mechanism.
You can receive commission rewards in three tiers (these are extra rewards from Upstart and do not reduce your team members‚Äô earnings).
1. When Friend A shares and becomes your Level-1 member, you earn 21% of A‚Äôs daily profit.
2. When A‚Äôs Friend B becomes your Level-2 member, you earn 7% of B‚Äôs daily profit.
3. When B‚Äôs Friend C becomes your Level-3 member, you earn 1% of C‚Äôs daily profit.
Example: If each A, B, and C member earns $100 per day, you receive:
‚Ä¢ Level-A member commission: $100 √ó 21% = $21
‚Ä¢ Level-B member commission: $100 √ó 7%  = $7
‚Ä¢ Level-C member commission: $100 √ó 1%  = $1
Your total team commission is 21% + 7% + 1% = 29%, which equals $29.
If you have 10 A-members, 100 B-members, and 1000 C-members each earning $100 daily, then:
A-level team income = 100 √ó 21% √ó 10  = $210
B-level team income = 100 √ó 7%  √ó 100 = $700
C-level team income = 100 √ó 1%  √ó 1000 = $1000
Your daily team income = 210 + 700 + 1000 = $1910
This is a very significant income.

commonProblems.title: Common Issues
lines: Here are some common issues to be aware of when participating in the Upstart program.
1. New users must deposit at least 30 USDT to begin trading.
2. To withdraw funds, you must complete quantitative trades totaling at least 20 USDT.
3. The minimum withdrawal amount is 50 USDT.
4. Withdrawal processing can take 9‚Äì16 hours; please be patient.
5. When depositing, the rate corresponding to your VIP level will automatically increase.
6. Exchange rates are based on current market prices.
7. All criteria may vary according to market analysis.
8. You must follow approved deposit methods and market regulations.
9. Please check your transaction logs regularly.
10. You can contact customer support at any time.
fees: Upstart‚Äôs quantitative system and automated guarantee process may incur additional withdrawal fees (0%‚Äì5%).
Fee rates are subject to change without notice.
Standard processing time is about 5 minutes; with guarantee processing, it may take up to 30 minutes.
Exchange rates are automatically updated based on market conditions.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
1. **General**

Welcome to Upstart. By using our service, you agree to these Terms of Service.

2. **Accounts**

Users must register with accurate information and are responsible for their credentials.

3. **Usage**

You may not misuse the service, including but not limited to hacking, reverse engineering, or any illegal activity.

4. **Data & Privacy**

We collect personal data to provide and improve our services. Please review our Privacy Policy for details.

5. **Modifications**

We may update these terms; continued use implies acceptance of any changes.

6. **Governing Law**

These terms are governed by the laws of your jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
1. **Introduction**

Upstart (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting it.

2. **Information We Collect**

- **Personal Data**: name, email, phone number, wallet addresses.
- **Usage Data**: pages visited, actions taken.

3. **How We Use Information**

We use your data to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations.

4. **Data Sharing**

We do not sell personal data. We may share with service providers under strict confidentiality.

5. **Security**

We implement industry‚Äëstandard measures to protect your information.

6. **Your Rights**

You may access, correct, or delete your personal data by contacting support.

7. **Changes**

We may revise this policy; we‚Äôll notify you of significant changes.
